devdoc.author: Gabriele Rigo - <gab@rigoblock.com>

epochEnded().details: Returns whether an epoch has ended.

getEpochReward().details: Returns the max epoch reward of a pool.

returns._0: Value of the maximum pool reward.

getInflationFactor(address).details: Return the reward factor for a group.

mintInflation().details: Allows staking proxy to mint rewards.

setAuthority(address).details: Allows rigoblock dao to update the authority.

setInflationFactor(address,uint256).details: Allows rigoblock dao to set the inflation factor for a group.

setRigoblock(address).details: Allows rigoblock dao to upgrade its address.

params.newRigoblockDaoAddress: Address of the new rigoblock dao.

timeUntilNextClaim().details: Returns how much time needed until next claim.

devdoc.title: Inflation - Allows ProofOfPerformance to mint tokens.
